text: Tshopo is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Kisangani. It name is from the Tshopo River. Before 2015, it was part of Orientale Province. ==Territories== The territories of Tshopo are: * Bafwasende * Banalia * Basoko * Isangi * Opala * Ubundu * Yahuma ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Tshopo
